metadata.title: CVE-2024-38857 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Improper neutralization of input in Checkmk before versions 2.3.0p8,2.2.0p28, 2.1.0p45, and 2.0.0 (EOL) allows attackers to craft maliciouslinks that can facilitate phishing attacks.

criterions.comment: check-mk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
